description: Try our easy to follow Pull-Apart Garlic, Herb & Cheese Bread recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pull-Apart Garlic, Herb & Cheese Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange dough balls into prepared pan, fitting them in snugly. Brush tops with whisked egg and sprinkle with tasty cheese and reserved parsley. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden. Serve warm.
